alert.note: Alert for Northern Grafton (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 3:43PM EST until December 26 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM SATURDAY TO 7 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of an inch or two with locally higher amounts over the higher terrain, sleet accumulations up to a half inch and ice accumulations of around a tenth of an inch expected. * WHERE...In New Hampshire, Northern Grafton County. In Maine, Interior York and Coastal York Counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM Saturday to 7 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For a more precise forecast for your specific location...go to www.weather.gov/gray..
